We cannot continue to accept an unregulated market that allows irresponsible companies to sell dangerous, contaminated products to our children.

The truth is that cosmetics are one of the least regulated consumer products on the market - we haven't updated our laws in over 80 years! We need to empower @US_FDA with the necessary authority to protect consumers.

Last night, FDA issued an alert that two more cosmetic products tested positive for asbestos. Right now FDA has to rely on companies to voluntarily recall contaminated products, which is unacceptable. That's why I'm working on bipartisan legislation to update our laws. https://twitter.com/patrizzuto/status/1136775740253511680 …
